text: hey everyone, I am relatively new here and previously would build sites using the bootstrap framework. Would anyone be able to share some pros/cons of using that in HubSpot? Would it totally mess up the grid system for drag and drop areas?

Could probably leverage bootstrap a few different ways. We use a few different proprietary themes that are based on HubSpot's boilerplate, but I have also used a few other templates using Foundation by Zurb. I am sure there's a bootstrap version out there, somewhere.
But yeah if you want to use HubSpot's flex columns in addition, it could get tricky and potentially conflict w Bootstraps responsiveness.
